SearchEquipmentGroupList.MainSQL: SELECT DISTINCT EQGRID FROM EQUIPMENT E (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN EquipmentSegment ES (NOLOCK) ON E.EQSGID = ES.EQSGID INNER JOIN EQUIPMENTSEGMENTATTR ESA (NOLOCK) ON E.EQSGID = ESA.EQSGID WHERE 1=1 AND ES.AREAID = @AREA_ID AND ESA.S38 = @SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE AND EQGRID NOT IN ('MCS') UNION SELECT DISTINCT EQGRID FROM EQUIPMENT E (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN EquipmentSegment ES (NOLOCK) ON E.EQSGID = ES.EQSGID INNER JOIN EQUIPMENTSEGMENTATTR ESA (NOLOCK) ON E.EQSGID = ESA.EQSGID WHERE 1=1 AND ES.AREAID = @AREA_ID AND EQGRID = 'PKG'
